Row.SQL: SELECT CivilizationType as PageId, null as PageGroupId, "Civilization" as PageLayoutId, Name, null as Tooltip FROM Civilizations where StartingCivilizationLevelType = "CIVILIZATION_LEVEL_WHITE_WALKER"

SELECT distinct Leaders.LeaderType AS PageId, null AS PageGroupId, "Leader" AS PageLayoutId, Leaders.Name, null AS Tooltip FROM Leaders INNER JOIN CivilizationLeaders on CivilizationLeaders.LeaderType = Leaders.LeaderType INNER JOIN Civilizations ON CivilizationLeaders.CivilizationType = Civilizations.CivilizationType WHERE Civilizations.StartingCivilizationLevelType = "CIVILIZATION_LEVEL_WHITE_WALKER"
